#Hardware in the Tablet.
 
This is the list of the main components in the tablet :-

 # Processor - OMAP 3530
 # Memory - Micron LP DDR
 # Display - 7" 800x480 ChunghWa CLAA070LCOCHW
 # Wifi and Bluetooth - Jorjin WG7310-00 (based on the twl 1270)
 # GPS - UBlox GPX 5010-ST
 # Touch Screen Controller TI TSC 2046I - Serial, SPI (Same pinout as ADS 7846). Has Touch Pressure Measurement
 # Audio Codec - Cirrus 43L22CNZ Portable Audio DAC with Integrated Class D Speaker Drive
 # TI 91 206W Chip -  TI BQ24073 USB-Friendly Li-Ion Battery Charger and Power-Path Management IC, Vout 4.4V
